javadoc: A length-prefixed string {@link DataType} (max 64k bytes) with char size of 1 byte, user setable {@link CharsetSettingsDefinition charset} (default ASCII), unbounded (ignores containing field size, relies on embedded length value).
name: PascalStringDataType
comment:
A length-prefixed string DataType (max 64k bytes) with char size of 1 byte,
 user setable CharsetSettingsDefinition (default ASCII),
 unbounded (ignores containing field size, relies on embedded length value).
